Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 5 Ganthagocchaka » 5.1 Ganthaduka » 5.1.7 Pañhāvāra » 5.1.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 5.1.7.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Kamma
Ganthagocchaka
Ganthaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Kamma
31.
1683Nogantho dhammo noganthassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—  sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā. Sahajātā—  noganthā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . Nānākkhaṇikā—  noganthā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)
1684Nogantho dhammo ganthassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—  noganthā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ ganthānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. (2)
1685Nogantho dhammo ganthassa ca noganthassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—  noganthā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ ganthānañca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)
